identity.title: Identity
identity.text: Sentinelle is an educational project of a citizen bug bounty platform designed to help secure Belgian SMEs. Contact: support@bugbounty.be.

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.text: This application is hosted only for academic and demonstration purposes.

object.title: Purpose of the website
object.text: The platform connects security researchers with companies in order to improve cybersecurity.

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.text: Sentinelle is a prototype. No guarantee is provided regarding availability, performance or accuracy of the data.

data.title: Data collected
data.text1: We only collect the data necessary for the operation of the platform:
data.item1: Account data: first name, last name, email address, password (hashed).
data.item2: Profile data: role (company, researcher, administrator), biography, professional links.
data.item3: Technical data: login logs, IP address, browser information.
data.item4: Report data: reported vulnerabilities and history of exchanges.
data.item5: Financial data: amounts paid or received, transaction identifiers through our payment providers.

purposes.title: Purposes of processing
purposes.item1: Creating and managing your user account.
purposes.item3: Managing bug bounty programs, reports and rewards.
purposes.item4: Securing the platform and preventing abuse.
purposes.item5: Producing anonymised statistics to improve the service.

basis.title: Legal basis
basis.text: Processing is based on the performance of a contract (account management), compliance with legal obligations (accounting), our legitimate interest (platform security) and, where applicable, your consent (optional communication).

retention.title: Data retention
retention.item1: Account data are deleted or anonymised within 30 days after a deletion request.
retention.item2: Financial data are kept for 10 years in accordance with accounting obligations.
retention.item3: Security-related technical logs are kept between 6 and 12 months.
retention.item4: Anonymised data may be kept without time limit for statistical purposes.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.text: You have the right of access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, portability and objection.
rights.contact: To exercise your rights, you can contact us at: privacy@bugbounty.be.

object.title: Purpose
object.text: These terms define the rules for using the Sentinelle platform by companies, researchers and administrators.

accounts.title: Account creation
accounts.text: The user agrees to provide accurate information, keep their password confidential and not impersonate any third party.

roles.title: Roles
roles.item1: The company creates bug bounty programs and defines the testing scope.
roles.item2: The researcher participates in programs and submits vulnerability reports.
roles.item3: The administrator moderates reports, manages users and supervises the platform.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable use
acceptableUse.text: Any use of the platform must comply with applicable laws and the bug bounty rules defined herein.
acceptableUse.item1: Any illegal or fraudulent activity is prohibited.
acceptableUse.item2: Destructive tests or tests outside the authorised scope are prohibited.
acceptableUse.item3: It is forbidden to publish defamatory, hateful or unlawful content.

suspension.title: Suspension and deletion
suspension.text: The administrator may suspend or delete an account in case of abuse, breach of these terms or malicious behaviour.

liability.text: The platform is provided as an educational prototype without any guarantee of availability or absence of errors.

use.title: Use of cookies
use.text: The platform only uses technical cookies that are strictly necessary for its operation (for example, to maintain the session or certain preferences). No advertising or tracking cookies are used in this prototype.

types.title: Types of cookies
types.item1: Session cookies required for the application to function.
types.item2: Possible preference cookies (for example language) if enabled.
types.item3: No analytical or marketing tracking cookies are used by default.

policy.title: Bug Bounty Policy and Participation Rules

object.title: Purpose
object.text: This policy governs the participation of researchers in bug bounty programs published on Sentinelle and defines a lawful and responsible framework for security testing.

scope.title: Authorised scope
scope.text: Testing is only allowed on programs and targets explicitly listed on the platform.
scope.item1: All tests must remain strictly within the scope defined by the program.
scope.item2: Any attack on systems or data outside the scope is strictly forbidden.
scope.item3: Tests must be designed to minimise impact on service availability.

rulesDo.title: Best practices (do)
rulesDo.item1: Prefer non-destructive tests and provide the minimum proof required for the vulnerability.
rulesDo.item2: Report vulnerabilities only through the platform and do not disclose them publicly.
rulesDo.item3: Respect data confidentiality and delete any copy after reporting.

rulesDont.title: Prohibited practices (don't)
rulesDont.item1: Denial of service attacks (DoS or DDoS).
rulesDont.item2: Intentional destruction or alteration of data.
rulesDont.item3: Massive data exfiltration or malicious exploitation of vulnerabilities.

safeharbor.title: Safe Harbor
safeharbor.text: As long as the researcher complies with this policy and the defined scope, Sentinelle and participating companies commit to handle reports in good faith and not to take legal action for actions performed within this framework.
